reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Strengthening HIV prevention and reduction of Tuberculosis morbidity and mortality

description.narrative: Botswana - TB/HIV - African Comprehensive HIV/AIDS Partnerships - ACHAP. This program has the following goals: Prevent new HIV infections by 2017. To reduce morbidity, mortality, psychosocial and economic impact associated with Tuberculosis by 2017. The objectives of this program are: Objective 6: To strengthen community and health systems for quality, comprehensive and sustainable integrated HIV/TB /RMNCH and other co-morbidities services. Objective 4: To expand and strengthen TB/HIV and drug resistant TB activities in all districts by 2017. Objective 1: To reduce the incidence rate of HIV among Batswana by 50% by 2017. Objective 5: To improve the ethical and legal environment to support the national response to HIV and AIDS by 2017. Objective 3: To strengthen high quality DOTS services in all districts by 2017. Objective 2: To increase access to HIV and AIDS comprehensive quality treatment, care and support services by 2017
